vote.title: Authorize the (1) acceptance of the Commercial Auto Theft Interdiction Squad/29 Grant (Grant No. 608-22-DPD0000) from the Motor Vehicle Crimes Prevention Authority (MVCPA) in the amount of $797,339.00 to provide a specialized proactive automobile theft program, for the period September 1, 2021 through August 31, 2022; (2) establishment of appropriations in an amount not to exceed $797,339.00 in the FY22 MVCPA -Commercial Auto Theft Interdiction Squad/29 Fund; (3) receipt and deposit of funds in an amount not to exceed $797,339.00 in the FY22 MVCPA-Commercial Auto Theft Interdiction Squad/29 Fund; (4) a local match in an amount not to exceed $176,785.00; (5) an In-Kind contribution in an approximate amount of $824,570.00; and (6) execution of the grant agreement and all terms, conditions, and documents required by the grant agreement - Total not to exceed $1,798,694.00 - Financing: Motor Vehicle Crimes Prevention Authority Grant Funds ($797,339.00) and General Fund ($1,001,355.00) (subject to appropriations)
vote.description: Authorize the (1) acceptance of the Commercial Auto Theft Interdiction Squad/29 Grant (Grant No. 608-22-DPD0000) from the Motor Vehicle Crimes Prevention Authority (MVCPA) in the amount of $797,339.00 to provide a specialized proactive automobile theft program, for the period September 1, 2021 through August 31, 2022; (2) establishment of appropriations in an amount not to exceed $797,339.00 in the FY22 MVCPA -Commercial Auto Theft Interdiction Squad/29 Fund; (3) receipt and deposit of funds in an amount not to exceed $797,339.00 in the FY22 MVCPA-Commercial Auto Theft Interdiction Squad/29 Fund; (4) a local match in an amount not to exceed $176,785.00; (5) an In-Kind contribution in an approximate amount of $824,570.00; and (6) execution of the grant agreement and all terms, conditions, and documents required by the grant agreement - Total not to exceed $1,798,694.00 - Financing: Motor Vehicle Crimes Prevention Authority Grant Funds ($797,339.00) and General Fund ($1,001,355.00) (subject to appropriations)
